name: LinkedIn Tool
natural_language_description: 这是 LinkedIn Tool 节点。主要用于: Consume LinkedIn API

descriptionType.name: descriptionType
descriptionType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Tool Description | 默认值: auto
available_options: Set Automatically (值: auto) - Automatically set based on resource and operation
Set Manually (值: manual) - Manually set the description

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.natural_language_description: 参数名: Description | 作用: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often | 默认值: Consume LinkedIn API | (必填项)

authentication.name: authentication
authentication.natural_language_description: 参数名: Authentication | 默认值: standard

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: post

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: create
available_options: Create (值: create) - Create a new post

postAs.name: postAs
postAs.description: If to post on behalf of a user or an organization
postAs.natural_language_description: 参数名: Post As | 作用: If to post on behalf of a user or an organization | 默认值: person

person.name: person
person.description: Person as which the post should be posted as. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
person.natural_language_description: 参数名: Person Name or ID | 作用: Person as which the post should be posted as. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression. | (必填项)

organization.name: organization
organization.description: URN of Organization as which the post should be posted as
organization.natural_language_description: 参数名: Organization URN | 作用: URN of Organization as which the post should be posted as

text.name: text
text.description: The primary content of the post
text.natural_language_description: 参数名: Text | 作用: The primary content of the post

shareMediaCategory.name: shareMediaCategory
shareMediaCategory.natural_language_description: 参数名: Media Category | 默认值: NONE
available_options: None (值: NONE) - The post does not contain any media, and will only consist of text
Article (值: ARTICLE) - The post contains an article URL
Image (值: IMAGE) - The post contains an image

binaryPropertyName.name: binaryPropertyName
binaryPropertyName.natural_language_description: 参数名: Input Binary Field | 提示: The name of the input binary field containing the file to be written | 默认值: data | (必填项)

additionalFields.name: additionalFields
additionalFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Additional Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: description (值: None) - Provide a short description for your image or article
originalUrl (值: None) - Provide the URL of the article you would like to share here
title (值: None) - Customize the title of your image or article
visibility (值: None) - Dictate if post will be seen by the public or only connections
